title: Strategies for Enhancing Online Discussion Quality Using Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Online discussion experience, basic digital literacy, and expertise in language fields
context.additional_context: For learners in administrative/leadership roles within advanced language proficiency groups, acquiring strategies to efficiently facilitate real-time online discussions is essential.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce cognitive load among discussion participants by 20% or more by applying four cognitive load theory-based discussion strategies.
Learners can enhance discussion quality by 30% or more using example-posting strategies and limited-post strategies.
Learners can select and apply filtering-posting strategies and integration strategies according to situational contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
